name: No Clue
description:
Controls

  • A/D- Horizontal Movemnt
  • W - Jump
  • Left/Right - Shot
  • ESC - Quit

Roguelike platform shooter, collect powerups and kill enemies throughout a completely randomly generated dungeon!

Created for MiniJam3.

By no means a complete game, a few things didn't get implemented but overall it's playable and doesn't look awful! All feedback is appreciated :D
